name: Endless Mountain
description:
This is a fun filled game! Players will control a cute cartoon dinosaur and skip the path filled with various obstacles by pressing the up button. Cacti, rocks, and other obstacles will constantly appear, and players need to remain vigilant and jump accurately to avoid them in order to achieve higher scores. The screen adopts a fresh and lively cartoon style, with bright colors that attract attention! The background sound effect is lively and dynamic, adding more fun to the game. Get ready to showcase your jumping skills and challenge the highest score! Come and experience the fun of this jumping adventure!
Game operation methods
Dinosaurs will continue to run forward
Please click the button on the screen. Controlling Dinosaurs Up or Down
Please control the dinosaurs to avoid obstacles or birds.
If dinosaurs fail to evade, they will die
How far can you run at most?
